form_title.ms_form_title_llm_v1: APPLICATION TO EXTEND TIME OF STAY OF NONQUOTA STUDENT, Form I-535

full_text: Form I-535 Form approved. UNITED STATES DEPARTMENT OF JUSTICE Budget Bureau No. 43-R067.1. IMMIGRATION AND NATURALIZATION SERVICE Approval expires March 31, 1949. (Rev. 8-10-47) APPLICATION TO EXTEND TIME OF STAY OF NONQUOTA STUDENT NOTE.-Application for extension shall be made on this form to the district director of the immigration district in which the institution which the student is attending is located. This application shall be submitted approximately 30 days prior to the expiration of the period for which admitted or to which admission has been extended. This application must be accompanied by the applicant's passport and any visitor's permit (Form I-94) issued to him when he was admitted to the United States. The passport and permit will be returned. File No. 0900/33210 My name is MAOLING LIU My age is 45 years. My place of birth is SHOU-KUANG HSIEN SHANTUNG CHINA (City or town) (Province) (State) I am a citizen or subject of CHINA (Country) My residence in the United States is 630 - LINCOLN ST.N.E.
